p: Based on the significant predictive nonspecific laboratory markers selected using the logistic regression model, a dynamic nomogram was created for the prediction of COVID-19 probabilities ( Figure 2). This online tool ( https://bjdth.shinyapps.io/COVID-19/) can be used to determine the risk of infection by COVID-19 by inputting the age (years), lymphocyte percentage (%), and monocyte count (Ã—10 9/L) values of the corresponding outpatients.
